results.name: (Balanced ternary representation of n) - (reversed balanced ternary representation of n).
comment: As the graph shows, there are large jumps at places where either A117966 or A134028 has a discontinuity, that is, at values of n which are a power of 3 times 1, 1.5, or 2. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 03 2016
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 16 2016
